Description: Located in the heart of Back Bay on the corner on Marlborough St and Dartmouth St. Close to Newbury Street, Commonwealth Ave Mall, Kenmore Square, Boston Common, Prudential Center, Copley Square, Restaurant Row, Boston Public Library, Public Gardens, Emerson College, Symphony Hall, Hynes Convention Center, and much more! Anything not in walking distance can be easily accessed by the close by public transportation: Green and Orange train lines nearby, as well as Silver Line shuttle, many major MBTA bus routes, and Commuter Rail at Back Bay Station
